src_original: 40.2 sa vi(ṃśatiśatavayaskaḥ kauśināgarāṇāṃ mallānāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhan saṃmataḥ //)
tgt_original: 時，彼國中諸力士輩供養恭敬，尊重讚歎是阿羅漢。

src_original: bhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ //  adya śramaṇasya gautamasya (rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati //)
tgt_original: 時，須跋陀羅傳聞人說婆伽婆於今日夜當入涅盤，作是念言：

src_original: 40.4 (asti ca me dharmeṣu kāṅkṣitat)  śā ca me santiṣṭhate pratibalaś ca (me)  sa bhavāṅ gautamas t(at kāṅkṣitatvaṃ prativinodayitum //)  40.5 (saced yena bhagavāṅ gautamas tenopasaṅkrameyam upasaṅkramya pṛccheyaṃ)  kañcid eva pradeśam //
tgt_original: 「我於法中，有所疑惑，唯有瞿曇，必能解釋，決我所疑。

src_original: 40.6 (śrutvā ca punaḥ kuśinagaryā niṣkramya yena yamakaśālavanaṃ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ //)
tgt_original: 」作是念已，即出拘尸那竭，往詣娑羅林。

src_original: nāyuṣmān ānanda ārāmadvāre 'bhyavakāś(e)  c(aṅk)  r(ame caṅkramyate //)  40.8 (adrākṣīt) subhadraḥ p(a)  r(ivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ dūrād eva //  dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān ānanda)  s t(e)  nopajagām(a //  upetyāyuṣmanta)  m ānandam idam avocat //
tgt_original: 尊者阿難在外經行，時，須跋陀見阿難已，即詣其所，白阿難言：

src_original: 40.9 śrutaṃ me bho ānandādya śramaṇ(asya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati //)
tgt_original: 「我聞他說，沙門瞿曇於今日中夜當入無餘涅盤，吾今須見，諮決所疑。

src_original: 40.12 (ānandāha // alaṃ subhadra mā bhagavantaṃ viheṭhaya śrāntakāyo bhagavāṅ klāntakāyaḥ sugataḥ //)  40.13 (dvir api trir api subha)  d(ra)  ḥ parivrā(jaka āyuṣmantam ā)
tgt_original: 「梵志！ 佛身疲惓，汝今擾惱。 」須跋陀羅白阿難言：

src_original: 40.14 śrutaṃ (bho ānanda purāṇānāṃ parivrājakānām antikāj jīrṇānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ mahatāṃ caraṇācāryāṇāṃ ka)  dācit karh(icit tathāgatā ar)  hantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā lo(ka utpadyante tadyathodumbaraṃ puṣpaṃ //)  40.15 (tasya cādya bhagavato gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme 'nu)  padhiśe(ṣe nirvāṇadhātau parini)  rvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati //  40.16 (asti ca me dharmeṣu kāṅkṣitatvam āśā ca me santiṣṭhate pratibalaś ca me sa bhavāṅ gautamas tat kāṅkṣitatvaṃ prativinodayitum //)  40.17 (saced yena bhagavāṅ gautamas tenopasaṅkrameyam upasaṅkramya pṛccheyaṃ kañcid eva pradeśam //
tgt_original: 「我聞如來今日中夜入無餘涅盤，我昔曾聞宿舊仙言：
